articles.title: An Air Force training drone washed ashore on a Florida beach
articles.description: The drone, part of the Air Force's weapons system evaluation program, was found on Friday on the shore of Boynton Beach in southeast Florida's Palm Beach County. It was quickly recovered by the Air Force and never posed a threat to the public.
